detailed_analysis.transcription: I am calling about an issue with my credit card bill I have been getting some strange charges and I need you to walk me through all recent transactions please provide me the transaction IDs Merchants names and amounts charged for all the transactions in the last 30 days I've lost track of my credit card so I can't look up the information for myself

gemini_analysis.explanation: The caller claims to have lost their credit card and is requesting all recent transactions and their details. This is a common tactic used by fraudsters to gather information for fraudulent activities.
red_flags: Caller claims to have lost their credit card
Caller requests all recent transactions and their details
recommendations: Do not provide any personal or financial information
Contact your credit card company directly using the number on the back of your card
Report the incident to the authorities
